channel.title: What is important bots or Quake 3?
channel.description: [poll] - I want better bots even if it requires a new game! - Quake 3 is the best even if the bot development is limited! [/poll]

item.title: What is important bots or Quake 3?
item.dc:creator: @coltongit Coltongit
item.description:
@coltongit wrote:

I voted that because I knew your engine was just a beefed-up id Tech 3 engine, which is what Q3A runs upon. And might I add, the game runs like a dream on this particular engine! Also, I would like to see who exactly voted on what answer, so that way it can clear confusion who voted for what sometimes. Would be useful in that case.

Read full topic
item.source: What is important bots or Quake 3?
